ygData.subject: ANN: SharpNEAT Release (31-May-2004)
ygData.msgSnippet: At the usual URL http://www.cgreen.dsl.pipex.com/ ... New network visualization windows in the main SharpNEAT executable. This includes a best genome window

At the usual URL http://www.cgreen.dsl.pipex.com/

Notes from the web site:

------------------
New network visualization windows in the main SharpNEAT executable. This 
includes a best genome window and a window for monitoring the best 
genomes from a selected range of species, you can also set this window 
to monitor the best N species.

New network visualization tool (bin/NetworkViewer.exe). Currently this 
loads and displays SharpNEAT network XML. There are plans turn this into 
an editor and to support loading/saving of other network and genome file 
formats

Important Notice. There currently exists a problem in the genome 
crossover code that allows multiple connections to accrue between two 
neurons, or between a single neuron in the case of recurrent 
conenctions. This will have some detrimental effect on searches, 
although how much of an effect is not known. This problem is being 
worked on.
------------------

Regarding the last point, I was intending to resolve this problem today 
but I'm still deciding on the best way to do this. I was going to try 
and maintain a full history of all additions, which would solve the 
problem and actually it sounds like a better strategy. Unfortunately if 
I do it this way then the problem re-appears when you distribute a 
search over multiple PCs - or at least the using the way I was thinking 
of doing distribution anyhow.
